p: Natural sandalwood oil and its main ingredient, Î±-santalol, have been reported to have chemopreventive effects on skin cancer [ 20]. Research indicates that SAO can arrest the cell cycle at G2/M; it also can induce cell death via apoptosis. SAO also has been shown to induce autophagy and cell death in proliferating keratinocytes, suggesting that it may prevent the development of precancerous conditions [ 21].
